ModuleDescription: This one-semester module covers the fundamentals of precision medicine. A list of covered topics are as below: - Gene Expression and Pharmacogenetics - Medical Genomics - Medical Bioinformatics - Metabolomics - Personalized Proteomics - Immunomics - Data Integration - Applications of Precision Medicine: potentials and challenges - Technological Advances in Precision Medicine and Drug Development - Protection and Commercialization of Precision Medicine Innovations: patent and regulatory frameworks
